uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the chat

actor_uid.description: The unique identifier (UID) of the actor that created the chat

config.description: A JSON object used to pass additional configuration to the chat agent at runtime. Note: The internal 'directory_uid' is stripped from the response.

updated_at.description: Date the chat was last updated

config.instruction: You are a helpful assistant. Answer all questions to the best of your ability.

description: Represents a business AI chat session, including agent, config, and audit timestamps.
